Original: Are you the famous [Guild] Guild?
I am an Yggdrasil researcher of the
Empire. I'm honored to meet you.
[Page]
I want you all to take a look at this.
It's a fan-shaped metal shard we found
in the Echoing Library.
[Page]
What caught my eye was this old
parchment attached to it... Let me
read it to you.
[Page]
"By the [Color:5]bond[Color:0] of the [Color:5]races[Color:0], the [Color:5]jeweled
sword[Color:0] shall be sealed in the [Color:5]Garden of
the Dancing Lepidopterae[Color:0]."
[Page]
The jeweled sword will surely fetch
a high price... I want your guild to
bring it to me.
[Page]
The rest of this parchment is so
weathered as to be illegible, but all
the important information is here.
[Page]
I don't know where this Garden of the
Dancing Lepidopterae is, but the races
must be the Vessels and Sentinels.
[Page]
The "bond," too... I know you have a
deep bond with them, which is why I
asked you. You may take this with you.
Translation: Are you the famous [Guild] Guild?
I am an Yggdrasil researcher of the
Empire. I'm honored to meet you.
[Page]
I want you all to take a look at this.
It's a fan-shaped metal shard we found
in the Echoing Library.
[Page]
What caught my eye was this old
parchment attached to it... Let me
read it to you.
[Page]
"By the [Color:5]bond[Color:0] of the [Color:5]races[Color:0], the [Color:5]jeweled
sword[Color:0] shall be sealed in the [Color:5]Garden of
the Dancing Lepidopterae[Color:0]."
[Page]
The jeweled sword will surely fetch
a high price... I want your guild to
bring it to me.
[Page]
The rest of this parchment is so
weathered as to be illegible, but all
the important information is here.
[Page]
I don't know where this Garden of the
Dancing Lepidopterae is, but the races
must be the Vessels and Sentinels.
[Page]
The "bond," too... I know you have a
deep bond with them, which is why I
asked you. You may take this with you.

Original: The mentioned races are probably the
Vessels and Sentinels. Why don't you
visit their villages?
[Page]
I'll wait here. Let me know of any
developments. I'm counting on you to
bring me that jeweled sword...
Translation: The mentioned races are probably the
Vessels and Sentinels. Why don't you
visit their villages?
[Page]
I'll wait here. Let me know of any
developments. I'm counting on you to
bring me that jeweled sword...

Original: Hello. How is the request going? Oh!
This is the metal shard I gave you...
So the three pieces became one.
Translation: Hello. How is the request going? Oh!
This is the metal shard I gave you...
So the three pieces became one.

Original: The [Color:5]Garden of the Dancing Lepidopterae[Color:0]
was the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0] at the Scarlet
Pillars... The jeweled sword is there.
[Page]
I'm stuck on that Sentinel who said
[Color:5]"something seems missing"[Color:0]... What
could it be missing?
[Page]
I'm sorry, but I must ask that you
carry on with the request. I am
counting on you.
Translation: The [Color:5]Garden of the Dancing Lepidopterae[Color:0]
was the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0] at the Scarlet
Pillars... The jeweled sword is there.
[Page]
I'm stuck on that Sentinel who said
[Color:5]"something seems missing"[Color:0]... What
could it be missing?
[Page]
I'm sorry, but I must ask that you
carry on with the request. I am
counting on you.

Original: Hello. How is the request going? Oh!
This is the metal shard I gave you...
So the three pieces became one.
Translation: Hello. How is the request going? Oh!
This is the metal shard I gave you...
So the three pieces became one.

Original: Hmm... So with the Vessel's help, you
went to the Moth's Garden, but were
unable to use the disc.
[Page]
I'm stuck on that Sentinel who said
[Color:5]"something seems missing"[Color:0]... What
could it be missing?
[Page]
I'm sorry, but I must ask that you
carry on with the request. I am
counting on you.
Translation: Hmm... So with the Vessel's help, you
went to the Moth's Garden, but were
unable to use the disc.
[Page]
I'm stuck on that Sentinel who said
[Color:5]"something seems missing"[Color:0]... What
could it be missing?
[Page]
I'm sorry, but I must ask that you
carry on with the request. I am
counting on you.

Original: I'm stuck on that Sentinel who said
[Color:5]"something seems missing"[Color:0]... What
could it be missing?
[Page]
I'm sorry, but I must ask that you
carry on with the request. I am
counting on you.
Translation: I'm stuck on that Sentinel who said
[Color:5]"something seems missing"[Color:0]... What
could it be missing?
[Page]
I'm sorry, but I must ask that you
carry on with the request. I am
counting on you.

Original: You finally put it together! I see...
The "missing piece" was the people
of Tharsis.
[Page]
With this, the Vessels, Sentinels,
Empire, and Tharsis are bound as one.
[Page]
The way to the jeweled sword is now
complete! Go to the Garden of Dancing
Lepidopterae... or the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0].
Translation: You finally put it together! I see...
The "missing piece" was the people
of Tharsis.
[Page]
With this, the Vessels, Sentinels,
Empire, and Tharsis are bound as one.
[Page]
The way to the jeweled sword is now
complete! Go to the Garden of Dancing
Lepidopterae... or the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0].

Original: How is the request going? Oh! Is this
the metal shard's completed form?
Translation: How is the request going? Oh! Is this
the metal shard's completed form?

Original: I see... it was made by combining the
metal shards from the Vessels and the
Sentinels.
[Page]
And its core is the gem from Tharsis'
Outland Count... Wonderful work!
[Page]
With this, the Vessels, Sentinels,
Empire, and Tharsis are bound as one.
[Page]
The way to the jeweled sword is now
complete! Go to the Garden of Dancing
Lepidopterae... or the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0].
Translation: I see... it was made by combining the
metal shards from the Vessels and the
Sentinels.
[Page]
And its core is the gem from Tharsis'
Outland Count... Wonderful work!
[Page]
With this, the Vessels, Sentinels,
Empire, and Tharsis are bound as one.
[Page]
The way to the jeweled sword is now
complete! Go to the Garden of Dancing
Lepidopterae... or the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0].

Original: If we believe the Vessel, the path
should open if you proceed to the
[Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0]...
[Page]
I am counting on you! Retrieve that
jeweled sword by any means necessary!
Translation: If we believe the Vessel, the path
should open if you proceed to the
[Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0]...
[Page]
I am counting on you! Retrieve that
jeweled sword by any means necessary!

Original: Welcome back. Ah, yes... this is the
jeweled sword... How did you ever
find it?
Translation: Welcome back. Ah, yes... this is the
jeweled sword... How did you ever
find it?

Original: So... this was keeping an ancient,
evil monster sealed...
[Page]
And I unwittingly requested that your
guild break the seal...
[Page]
How irresponsible I've been! If any
other guild had accepted the request,
I shudder to think...
[Page]
*sigh*
[Page]
I cannot accept this. Someone with
more merit, like yourselves, should
have it in honor of your bonds.
[Page]
And the raging bird within... it
recognizes your guild as its betters.
That may be why it is calm for now.
[Page]
Thank you for all you've done for me,
and I am sorry to put you in such
danger. Your reward is at the bar.
Translation: So... this was keeping an ancient,
evil monster sealed...
[Page]
And I unwittingly requested that your
guild break the seal...
[Page]
How irresponsible I've been! If any
other guild had accepted the request,
I shudder to think...
[Page]
*sigh*
[Page]

more merit, like yourselves, should
have it in honor of your bonds.
[Page]

recognizes your guild as its betters.

and I am sorry to put you in such
danger. Your reward is at the bar.
